SELECT diary_id diaryId, image1 image1 FROM diarys WHERE diary_id IN (SELECT diary_id FROM (SELECT diary.diary_id, challenge.title, dog.breed, user.name FROM diarys diary LEFT JOIN challenges challenge ON diary.challenge_id = challenge.challenge_id LEFT JOIN dogs dog ON diary.user_id = dog.user_id LEFT JOIN users user ON diary.user_id = user.user_id) j WHERE title LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR breed LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR name LIKE '%${keyword}%')
